com.epoch.db

Class TranslnRead

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.TranslnRead
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuestionConstants, XMLConstants

    public final class TranslnRead
extends DBCommon
implements QuestionConstants
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to translations. Translations of ACE phrases have negative ID numbers derived from the hashcode; translations of question content have positive ID numbers derived from a sequencer.

    • Method Detail

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

      • translate

        public static void translate(String[] phrases,
                             String[] userLangs)
                      throws DBException
        Gets translations of phrases from the database, replacing English phrases in the array with their translations. If the English phrase is not in the database, adds it.
        Parameters:
        phrases - array of phrases to be translated; modified by this method
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • translate

        public static void translate(String[] phrases,
                             String[] userLangs,
                             boolean addNewPhrasesToDB)
                      throws DBException
        Gets translations of phrases from the database, replacing English phrases in the array with their translations.
        Parameters:
        phrases - array of phrases to be translated; modified by this method
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
        addNewPhrasesToDB - whether to add new English phrases to the database
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getTranslatedParts

        static void getTranslatedParts(Connection con,
                               List<Integer> phraseIds,
                               Map<Integer,ArrayList<int[]>> itemIdsByPhraseIds,
                               Map<Integer,Question> questionsById,
                               Map<Integer,String> headersByQSetIds,
                               String[] userLangs,
                               int itemType)
        Gets translations of headers, question statements, evaluator feedbacks, or question data from the database and replaces the English versions.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection
        phraseIds - ID numbers of the phrases to be translated
        itemIdsByPhraseIds - list of arrays of identifying information of the items whose phrases are being translated, keyed by the phrase ID. The size of the identifying information depends on itemType:
        when itemType == HEADERS, its one member is the question set's ID;
        when itemType == QSTMTS, its one member is the question's unique ID;
        when itemType == EVALS, its two members are the question's unique ID and the evaluator's major ID (serial number);
        when itemType == QDATA, its three members are the question's unique ID, the question datum's serial number, and the type of data (Marvin or other).
        questionsById - map of questions being retrieved whose components are being translated, keyed by IDs
        headersByQSetIds - map of common question statements associated with the questions whose components are being translated, keyed by question set IDs
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
        itemType - whether headers, question statements, evaluator feedbacks, or question data are being translated

      • modifyItem

        private static void modifyItem(List<String[]> translations,
                               String[] userLangs,
                               List<int[]> itemIdsList,
                               Map<Integer,Question> questionsById,
                               Map<Integer,String> headersByQSetIds,
                               int itemType)
        From all translations of a particular phrase in all languages, gets the translation in a preferred language (if any) and replaces the English version.
        Parameters:
        translations - list of two-member arrays, each containing a language and the translation of the phrase into that language
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
        itemIdsList - list of arrays of identifying information about each item (with the same phrase) being translated:
        when itemType == HEADERS, its one member is the question set's ID;
        when itemType == QSTMTS, its one member is the question's unique ID;
        when itemType == EVALS, its two members are the question's unique ID and the evaluator's major ID (serial number);
        when itemType == QDATA, its three members are the question's unique ID, the question datum's serial number, and the type of data (Marvin or other).
        questionsById - map of questions being retrieved whose components are being translated, keyed by IDs
        headersByQSetIds - map of common question statements associated with the questions whose components are being translated, keyed by question set IDs
        itemType - whether headers, question statements, evaluator feedbacks, or question data are being translated

      • getBestTranslation

        private static String getBestTranslation(List<String[]> translations,
                                         String[] userLangs)
        Gets the optimum translation from a list.
        Parameters:
        translations - list of two-member arrays, each containing a language and the translation of the phrase into that language
        userLangs - userLangs preferred by this user in order of preference
        Returns:
        a translated phrase, or null if none was found

        Parameters:
        language - a language
        Returns:
        the ISO 639-2 code, or null if not found

                                             String language)
                                      throws DBException
        Gets the question statements of the given questions translated into a language.
        Parameters:
        qIds - unique IDs of the questions
        language - the language of translation
        Returns:
        array of translated question statements in the same order as the question IDs; null if a translation was not found

      • getFeedbacks

        public static void getFeedbacks(List<Integer> qIds,
                                String[][] evalFeedbacks,
                                List<HashMap<Integer,Integer>> evalNumsByMajorIdsByQNums,
                                String language)
                         throws DBException
        Gets the feedback of the given evaluators data translated into a language, storing the retrieved data in a method parameter.
        Parameters:
        qIds - unique IDs of the questions
        evalFeedbacks - array of arrays in which to store translations of evaluator feedbacks by question number and evaluator number; modified by method
        evalNumsByMajorIdsByQNums - for each question, table of evaluator numbers (0, 1, 2, etc.) keyed by majorIds (may skip some numbers)
        language - the language of translation
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getQData

        public static void getQData(List<Integer> qIds,
                            String[][] qdTexts,
                            List<HashMap<Integer,Integer>> qdNumsByQDSerialNosByQNums,
                            String language)
                     throws DBException
        Gets the data or molecule names of the given question data translated into a language, storing the retrieved data in a method parameter.
        Parameters:
        qIds - unique IDs of the questions
        qdTexts - array of arrays in which to store translations of question data by question number and datum number; modified by method
        qdNumsByQDSerialNosByQNums - for each question, table of question datum numbers (0, 1, 2, etc.) keyed by serialNos (may skip some numbers)
        language - the language of translation
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getUntransldHeaders

        public static String[] getUntransldHeaders(String lang)
                                    throws DBException
        Gets the names of question sets whose headers (common question statements) have not been translated into a certain language, excluding headers from certain topics.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language
        Returns:
        an array of topic and question set names
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getUntransldQStmts

        public static Map<String,int[]> getUntransldQStmts(String lang)
                                            throws DBException
        Gets the questions whose statements have not been translated into a certain language, excluding questions from certain topics.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language
        Returns:
        a map of question serial numbers keyed by topic and question set names
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getUntransldEvals

        public static Map<String,int[]> getUntransldEvals(String lang)
                                           throws DBException
        Gets the questions whose statements have not been translated into a certain language, excluding questions from certain topics.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language
        Returns:
        a map of question serial numbers keyed by topic and question set names
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getUntransldTextQData

        public static Map<String,int[]> getUntransldTextQData(String lang)
                                               throws DBException
        Gets the questions whose text-based question data have not been translated into a certain language, excluding questions from certain topics.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language
        Returns:
        a map of question serial numbers keyed by topic and question set names
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
